post.title: which store are you lining up at on launch day?
post.content: for those of you die-hards who will be in the door within the first few seconds of the official launch, which store do you plan on lining up at? which reminds me, i probably need to update my map for you guys before the launch! (i hope it's not this monday, because i have an exam and would need to skip and fail it...) google maps link: http://tr.im/windon
